issue.title: [Python][CI] Enable CI for Python on s390x
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14625](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14625). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We will support big-endian for Python. As the first step, we will enable Python CI on s390x using TravisCI.
